content:
Insurance

The Insurance Policyholder Portal is a self-service portal that empowers policyholders to manage their insurance accounts conveniently and independently. Policyholders can access policy details, review coverage options, submit claims, and track claim progress from the comfort of their devices.

Set up the Insurance Policyholder Portal using the Financial Services template in Experience Cloud and configure self-service capabilities.
title: Personalizing Digital Experiences for Insurance Policyholders
